author: ddas
msg: Merge -r 760782:760783 from trunk onto 0.20 branch. Fixes HADOOP-4374.

author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-4374. Installs a shutdown hook in the Task JVM so that log.index is updated before the JVM exits. Also makes the update to log.index atomic. Contributed by Ravi Gummadi.

msg: added tree-based resolution result to request/response
